steps: Hello! I'm Alpha. I can help you get started with the tools here.
To download any tool, simply click on its name in the list.
Files ending in '.reg' are registry files. After downloading, just double-click them to apply the changes.
Files like '.cmd' or '.exe' are scripts or programs you can run directly.
Use the search bar at the top to quickly filter the list by name or tag. Enjoy the archives!
